TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 13
TEI.2.document_title: J C Peyton to Stephen F Austin, 02-06-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with J. C. Peyton, February 6, 1828. Ferriage.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 13

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with J. C. Peyton, February 6, 1828. Ferriage.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*in Account with *person_mentioned*J. C. Peyton*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. Stephen, F. Austin*/person_mentioned* Dr $ cts*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="01-02-1827">January 2,1827*/date_mentioned* To Ferry Accompts*/p*
*p*By *person_mentioned*Washington */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Henry*/person_mentioned*------------- 1 1/2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-03-1827">3*/date_mentioned* By *person_mentioned*Washington */person_mentioned*G[oing] and C[oming]------ 25*/p*
*p*Ditto By *person_mentioned*Henry */person_mentioned*Gowing [going]----- 1 1/4*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-23-1827">23*/date_mentioned* By *person_mentioned*negro girl*/person_mentioned* gowing---- 6 1/2*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="01-24-1827">24*/date_mentioned* By *person_mentioned*Negro Boy*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*C and G*/person_mentioned*------ 12 1/2*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="01-26-1827">26Jany*/date_mentioned*—*/p* *p*To self and *person_mentioned*Company g and c*/person_mentioned* from*/p*
*p*a Dinner at *person_mentioned*Mr Westall*/person_mentioned*s 15 persons-------1.87 1/2*/p* *p*By *person_mentioned*Morley Waller*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*G and C-*/person_mentioned*--- 12 1/2*/p*
*p*By *person_mentioned*Spaniard */person_mentioned*Coming-------------6 1/2*/p*
*p*Self gowing-------------12 1/2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-28-1827">28*/date_mentioned* By *person_mentioned*Spaneard */person_mentioned*gowing--------------- 12 1/2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-05-1827">Feb*/date_mentioned*. Ditto By 2 Ferriages------- 12 1/2*/p*
*p*5 Ditto By Bay 3 ferriages------------- 18 1/2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-06-1827">6 */date_mentioned*By *person_mentioned*Spaneard */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Washington */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*g and c—.*/person_mentioned*------------------_----- 25*/p* *p* By *person_mentioned*Washington */person_mentioned*Gowing------------12 1/2*/p*
*p*By *person_mentioned*Perroagne */person_mentioned*after Corn-------50*/p*
*p*$4.18 3/4*/p* *p*Paid on settlement *date_mentioned n="10-11-1828">Oct. 11, 1828—*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Indorsed:] *person_mentioned*J. C. Peyton*/person_mentioned* Ferry a/c*/p*
*/div1*
